entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
